snippet: The gas products provider Linde will pay $41.50 a share, 64 percent above Lincare's closing price on June 26.
abstract: The gas products provider Linde will pay $41.50 a share, 64 percent above Lincare's closing price on June 26.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Linde of Germany to Buy Lincare for $3.8 Billion
